Name: The Currier
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: A wonderfully cleansing after-dinner cocktail with bourbon and lime plus hints of caraway and fennel courtesy of Kümmel.
History: Recipe created in July 2006 by Murray Stenson at ZigZag Café, Seattle, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of The Currier contains 157 calories
